messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Gray Wolf's average build?
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Gray Wolf's HP?
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the Gray Wolf's fighting attacks?
Teeth, claws and mauling.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Gray Wolf's armor?
1-point fur
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the primary characteristic of Lovecraft's stories?
They stood alone rather than being part of a cohesive whole.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Cthulhu Mythos primarily composed of?
The repeated story elements
You are a helpful assistant.
What does Lovecraft attempt to capture in his stories?
A certain feel and atmosphere
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Cthulhu Mythos also known as?
The body of what has become known as the Cthulhu Mythos
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the Cthulhu Mythos?
The body of what has become known as the Cthulhu Mythos
You are a helpful assistant.
Can inconsistencies and contradictions be found in the Cthulhu Mythos?
Yes, it is also true of the Cthulhu Mythos
You are a helpful assistant.
What role should the Keeper play in creating unique stories?
You should feel empowered to make your own decisions
You are a helpful assistant.
Is it possible to define the Cthulhu Mythos too closely for the reader?
For this book to attempt to define it too closely may prove counterproductive for the reader
You are a helpful assistant.
What makes the Cthulhu Mythos fertile ground for others to cultivate their own story-seeds?
These very inconsistencies and contradictions
You are a helpful assistant.
Why should the Keeper feel empowered to make their own decisions in the Cthulhu Mythos?
Using the various entities, dei-ties, tomes, and so on as building blocks to create their own unique stories.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is a potential drawback for the reader if the book attempts to define the Cthulhu Mythos too closely?
It may prove counterproductive for the reader.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the purpose of providing classifications of the Mythos entities?
Provided merely as a guide for those who might prefer a more definite structure.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the primary intention of the Cthulhu Mythos?
The Cthulhu Mythos is meant to be beyond man's understanding
You are a helpful assistant.
What classifications of the Mythos entities are provided as a guide?
Elder Gods, Outer Gods, Other Gods
You are a helpful assistant.
How are the Outer Gods, Elder Gods, and Other Gods typically described?
They are all extremely powerful alien beings, some of which may be of extra-cosmic origin
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the primary goal of attempting to define the Cthulhu Mythos?
It may prove counterproductive for the reader
You are a helpful assistant.
Are the Outer Gods the ruling deities of the universe?
Yes, the Outer Gods rule the universe and have little to do with humanity, except for Nyarlathotep.
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens to humans who meddle with these entities?
Humans meddling with these entities suffer, usually ending up mad or dead.
You are a helpful assistant.
Can any of the known Outer Gods be considered 'true gods'?
No, the known Outer Gods appear almost to be true gods, as opposed to the alien horror of the Great Old Ones.
You are a helpful assistant.
Do some of the Outer Gods take interest in human affairs?
Yes, only a few of these deities seem to take interest in human affairs or to acknowledge the existence of the human race.
